title: Amberton
description: Amberton is located in the heart of Old Town, just a few steps from Cathedral Square. It offers air conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TVs, work desks and a free internet connection.

title: Kempinski Hotel
description: Kempinski Hotel Cathedral Square is in the Old Town, at the cathedral Square, in front of the Gediminas Tower. It offers elegant, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and access to the spa center.

title: Pan Tadeusz
description: The 3-star hotel Pan Tadeusz is located in Vilnius’s Naujamiestis District, 2 km from the Old Town. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a minibar. Free parking is also provided.

title: Ramada Hotel
description: Located directly on Vilnius’s Old Town, Ramada Hotel & Suites Vilnius offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free WiFi. This 5 plus star hotel features a wellness centre with a steam bath and a hot tub and guests have free access from 7 am to 3 pm.
